result.orig: Téim chuig ceolchoirmeacha freisin
result.html: Téim chuig ceolchoirmeacha freisinI go to concerts as well.
result.ponchtml: Téim ċuig ceolċoirmeaċa freisinI go to concerts as well.

result.eng: I know well that you are proud of her, and not without reason.
result.ga: Tá a fhios agam go maith go bhfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agat
result.orig: Tá a fhios agam go maith go bhfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agat
result.html: Tá a fhios agam go maith go bhfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agatI know well that you are proud of her, and not without reason.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios agam go maiṫ go ḃfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agatI know well that you are proud of her, and not without reason.

result.eng: I knew well that if I could reach Europe, I would have succeeded.
result.ga: Thuig mé féin dá bhféadfainn an Eoraip a bhaint amach go mbeadh liom
result.orig: Thuig mé féin dá bhféadfainn an Eoraip a bhaint amach go mbeadh liom
result.html: Thuig mé féin dá bhféadfainn an Eoraip a bhaint amach go mbeadh liomI knew well that if I could reach Europe, I would have succeeded.
result.ponchtml: Ṫuig mé féin dá ḃféadfainn an Eoraip a ḃaint amaċ go mbeaḋ liomI knew well that if I could reach Europe, I would have succeeded.

result.eng: Well, you'll be made a saint one day!
result.ga: Muise déanfar naomh díot go fóill
result.orig: Muise déanfar naomh díot go fóill
result.html: Muise déanfar naomh díot go fóillWell, you'll be made a saint one day!
result.ponchtml: Muise déanfar naoṁ díot go fóillWell, you'll be made a saint one day!

result.eng: We'll be fine without you.
result.ga: Beidh muid go breá do d'uireasa
result.orig: Beidh muid go breá do d'uireasa
result.html: Beidh muid go breá do d'uireasaWe'll be fine without you.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ muid go breá do d'uireasaWe'll be fine without you.

result.eng: She lost her passport as well as other official documents.
result.ga: Chaill sí a pas chomh maith le doiciméid oifigiúla eile
result.orig: Chaill sí a pas chomh maith le doiciméid oifigiúla eile
result.html: Chaill sí a pas chomh maith le doiciméid oifigiúla eileShe lost her passport as well as other official documents.
result.ponchtml: Ċaill sí a pas ċoṁ maiṫ le doiciméid oifigiúla eileShe lost her passport as well as other official documents.

result.eng: They moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.
result.ga: Bhog siad go dtí an Fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do Ghiúdaigh na Polainne
result.orig: Bhog siad go dtí an Fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do Ghiúdaigh na Polainne
result.html: Bhog siad go dtí an Fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do Ghiúdaigh na PolainneThey moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.
result.ponchtml: Ḃog siad go dtí an Ḟrainc mar is maiṫ a d'airiġ siad an ċontúirt a ḃí ann do Ġiúdaiġ na PolainneThey moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.

result.eng: It wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maith
result.orig: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maith
result.html: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maithIt wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ ag na Naitsiṫe ċoṁ maiṫIt wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: I well remember travelling to Illinois from Ireland once.
result.ga: Is maith is cuimhin liom taisteal go Illinois as Éirinn uair amháin
result.orig: Is maith is cuimhin liom taisteal go Illinois as Éirinn uair amháin
result.html: Is maith is cuimhin liom taisteal go Illinois as Éirinn uair amháinI well remember travelling to Illinois from Ireland once.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ is cuiṁin liom taisteal go Illinois as Éirinn uair aṁáinI well remember travelling to Illinois from Ireland once.

result.eng: I had to remove my shoes, my belt and every piece of metal, as well as any liquids and pastes I had.
result.ga: B'éigean dom mo bhróga mo chrios agus gach píosa miotal a bhaint díom maille le pé leachtanna agus taois a bhí agam
result.orig: B'éigean dom mo bhróga mo chrios agus gach píosa miotal a bhaint díom maille le pé leachtanna agus taois a bhí agam
result.html: B'éigean dom mo bhróga mo chrios agus gach píosa miotal a bhaint díom maille le pé leachtanna agus taois a bhí agamI had to remove my shoes, my belt and every piece of metal, as well as any liquids and pastes I had.
result.ponchtml: B'éigean dom mo ḃróga mo ċrios agus gaċ píosa miotal a ḃaint díom maille le pé leaċtanna agus taois a ḃí agamI had to remove my shoes, my belt and every piece of metal, as well as any liquids and pastes I had.

result.eng: She knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ga: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.orig: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.html: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ponchtml: Ṫuig sí go maiṫ gur iomaí iriseoir a tógaḋ amaċ as an óstán ar ċláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].

result.eng: The Nazis didn't stop with Poland  and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.orig: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.html: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maithThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: Níor stop na Naitsiṫe leis an bPolainn agus níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ acu ċoṁ maiṫThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: You could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ga: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.orig: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.html: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ċoṁ maiṫ a ḃeiṫ ag caint leis an ġealaċ le a ḃeiṫ ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.

result.eng: Well, that's the seventh commandment for you, whatever you think of it.
result.ga: Bhail sin an seachtú haithne agat is déan a mhór nó a bheag di
result.orig: Bhail sin an seachtú haithne agat is déan a mhór nó a bheag di
result.html: Bhail sin an seachtú haithne agat is déan a mhór nó a bheag diWell, that's the seventh commandment for you, whatever you think of it.
result.ponchtml: Ḃail sin an seaċtú haiṫne agat is déan a ṁór nó a ḃeag diWell, that's the seventh commandment for you, whatever you think of it.

result.eng: I remember well the afternoon I left.
result.ga: Is maith is cuimhin liom an tráthnóna a d'imigh mé
result.orig: Is maith is cuimhin liom an tráthnóna a d'imigh mé
result.html: Is maith is cuimhin liom an tráthnóna a d'imigh méI remember well the afternoon I left.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ is cuiṁin liom an tráṫnóna a d'imiġ méI remember well the afternoon I left.
